thread.section_title: PlushBeds.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PlushBeds.com | plushbeds.com
thread.title: Julie H.

author: Julie H.
title: Julie H.
text: We already owned a VERY expensive king natural latex mattress and pillows with organic wool covers from a brick and mortar store. When we needed a guest room king mattress we decided to take a big risk and order PlushBeds 12 inch thick natural latex mattress with organic wool cover and various pillows (molded latex, shredded latex and organic wool) needless to say everything is perfect and for less than half of what our original purchase cost. We will definitely use this company again!
